message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,001.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $1,150,000 for it.  Let me know if you're open to that.

Bob, I understand you're looking to get a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1,300,000. This is the lowest I can go, but I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
